                                int customerId,
                                int shopp)
        Creates IShoppingCart object from given sessionId and customerId while getting id from SQL
        Parameters:
        sessionId - the session id of the shopping cart to be created.
        customerId - the customer id of the shopping cart to be created.
        Returns:
        IShoppingCart object after creation.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if sessionId or customerId < 0
        SQLException - if there's problem connecting to database
